component.type: Build and integrate a photo widget
component.description: Using the Flickr API to grab photos relevant to Leeds and Brno (twinned cities/towns) and integrate the component with the main application. Also add an option to upload your own images.
component.problems: Only using the correct licenced photos, for example, photos with a creative commons licence. Cache Getting used to Flickr, most examples used python and I wanted to stick with PHP, and getting used to grabbing information. If you uploaded an image, you would get stuck on the uploads page.
component.solutions: Adding another button to the form for licensing (changes the call to flickr), to show that our application only uses the correct creative common licenses, but also showing what the output would be if you allowed for any license. Trying different ways to cache, using SQL and PHPMyAdmin, using arrays, and also trying to create files to refrence. Messing around with Flickr for a few hours, getting outputs as XML (REST), JSON and PHP Serial, and seeing which I liked to work with the most. Added a back button to the uploads page, so the user can go back to the main application.
